job_description.summary: Harapan Kita Hospital is located in Jakarta, Indonesia, founded on December 22, 1979. Have a vision of being at the forefront of women's, perinatal, and child health services.
details: Implement feature in SMART RSAB Backoffice web application.
Collaborate with fellow Software Engineer in problem solving and development issues.
Work closely with a System Analyst for immediate bugs/issues resolution.
Researching and evaluating new technologies that may improve our processes or code bases.

job_description.summary: Pintarnya is a job apps or job search platform provide thousand job vacancy and fresher jobs based in Indonesia.
details: Contributed to the successful launch of a mobile-responsive, increase mobile traffic and user experience up to 30%.
Collaborate with UI and backend teams to implement design and ensure smooth integration with backend functionalities.
Improving web performance, including code optimization and image compression best practices.
Work closely with QA for immediate bugs/issues resolution.

job_description.summary: Alodokter is the #1 digital health company in Indonesia. Alodokter brings high-quality medical services to its 30 million+ Monthly Active Users by providing an integrated mobile solution for patients and doctors.
details: Success revamp the UI/UX for the booking doctor process, resulting in a 40% increase in user engagement.
Collaborate with Head of Engineering to improve web performance and loading speeds up to 20%.
Implement A/B tests on web components, resulting in improved conversion rates and user engagement.
Work closely with QA and Product Manager for immediate bugs/issues resolution.
